attributes.additional_details: Recently and also before covid started HLTAs and.Teaching assistants have covered roles as teachers. We have been overloaded with extra work .we mark plan ,have not small but large groups to focus on ,We go above and beyond our role and are not treated equal to teachers.We think it's about time we were noticed to
attributes.background: We would like the parliament to agree on equal rights at work no matter your job statues .To be entitled to a pay rise if you go beyond your means and meet targets .

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you would like to see changes to working standards for teachers and teaching assistants but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. If you do decide to start a new petition you'll need to give your full name.
